programme.title: Martha Stewart Living
programme.desc: Best of Organizing Basics: Cleaning Light Bulbs, Hot Milk Cake, Warming Up Before Exercise, Chicken and Vegetable Saute with Lemon Parmesan Rice, House Numbers Project, Pet Tip: Storing Dog Food

programme.title: Martha Stewart Living
programme.sub-title: Lumpia, Pickled Green Papaya, Mango Tart
programme.desc: Filipino Culinary Specialties: Lumpia, Pickled Green Papaya, Mango Tart, Do You Know: Mango

programme.title: Martha Gardens
programme.desc: Meet Martha's chickens! Now with over 200 chickens and 20 different breeds, Martha shares her vast knowledge about raising and caring for her flock. Then learn the how-tos of building the a coop.

programme.title: Martha Gardens
programme.sub-title: Martha Builds a Raised Bed Vegetable Garden
programme.desc: Martha builds a brand new, half-acre raised bed vegetable garden on her farm! It's a step-by-step guide to designing, building, preparing the soil, and planting.

programme.title: Martha Gardens
programme.desc: Everything is coming up roses on Martha's Bedford farm; join Martha while she creates new garden with almost 200 roses.

programme.title: Martha Gardens
programme.desc: Welcome to Martha's woodland gardens. Martha's azalea grove is bursting with the last flowers of spring. Everything you need to know about hostas. Martha takes up bird watching.

programme.title: Martha Gardens
programme.sub-title: Martha's Amazing Maze and How to Grow Trees From Seedlings
programme.desc: Welcome to Martha's passion project: the maze on her Bedford farm. Learn how to properly plant trees including measuring, fertilizing, and watering. Plus, how to start trees from seedlings.

programme.title: Martha Gardens
programme.sub-title: Everything You Need To Know About Conifers
programme.desc: Martha celebrates all things conifers, the cone-bearing trees that are typically evergreens. Go inside the Christmas tree farm on her Bedford farm and learn how to properly move an established tree.

programme.title: Martha Cooks
programme.desc: Martha samples bagel toppings and is joined by Gary Greengrass, owner of Barney Greengrass, an NYC staple; at PopUp Bagels, Martha makes bagels and constructs breakfast sandwiches with Adam Goldberg.

programme.title: Martha Cooks
programme.desc: Martha makes the classic meringue cake from Casa Cipriani with pastry chef Alessia Tomassetti; Martha and bakery owner Lucie Franc De Ferriere bake a pear raspberry cake with jam and maple buttercream.

programme.title: Martha Cooks
programme.desc: Martha and Chef Daniel Humm make redefined vegan dishes; Martha and Chef Daniel make a refreshing cocktail and gazpacho, followed by mushroom and seaweed baked rice and a rhubarb cobbler for dessert.

programme.title: Martha Cooks
programme.desc: Martha and Chef Costas Spiliadis of Estiatorio Milos make Taramosalata and salad; they build an eggplant and zucchini tower with tzatziki; then, they salt-bake a fish served with yogurt.

programme.title: Martha Cooks
programme.desc: Martha tours NYC's Tin Building, guided by chef and owner Jean-Georges; Martha is then joined by three Tin Building chefs and makes a lemon pizza, french onion soup, and chili mala chicken.

programme.title: Martha Cooks
programme.sub-title: Martha Throws an Argentine Asado BBQ
programme.desc: Martha throws an Argentinian Asado BBQ at Bedford

programme.title: Martha Cooks
programme.sub-title: The Perfect Jams to Pair With a Simple Breakfast
programme.desc: Martha makes her favorite jam recipes

programme.title: Martha Stewart's Cooking School
programme.desc: Fried foods should be golden brown and never greasy. Martha deep-fries and pan-fries to perfection: French fries, pan-fried chicken, and Japanese tempura vegetables

programme.title: Martha Stewart's Cooking School
programme.desc: Pan-searing means browning food over high heat to develop a crust and lock in juiciness. Martha prepares scallops, salmon fillets, steak with mustard cream sauce, duck breasts

programme.title: Martha Stewart's Cooking School
programme.desc: A beautifully cooked roast makes a grand centerpiece for any dinner. Martha shares techniques for prime rib roast, crown roast of pork, and stuffed turkey breast

programme.title: Martha Stewart's Cooking School
programme.desc: Hearty stews are made with inexpensive cuts of meat and require little hands-on prep time. Martha demonstrates three classic recipes: beef stew, coq au vin, and veal stew

programme.title: Martha Stewart's Cooking School
programme.desc: Nothing comforts like a bowl of homemade soup. Once you master a few basics, you can make many variations. Watch Martha make chicken soup, minestrone, and spinach cream soup

programme.title: Martha Stewart's Cooking School
programme.desc: Martha blanches, steams, and roasts vegetables to enhance flavor and retain nutritional properties: crudite, steamed artichokes, vegetable tian, and roasted pepper salad

programme.title: Martha Stewart's Cooking School
programme.desc: Learn the art of making fresh pasta from scratch with Martha and Michael White, chef and pasta specialist: make pasta dough and form it into stands or shapes

programme.title: Martha Stewart's Cooking School
programme.desc: Martha creates four pasta sauces: traditional bolognese, quick-and-easy puttanesca, rich carbonara, and a light sauce made with bottarga (a specialty of Southern Italy)

programme.title: Martha Bakes
programme.desc: Martha creates three baked goods using unique flours beyond the white variety: herb quiche with rye crust, muesli coffee cake, and seeded savory quick bread

programme.title: Martha Bakes
programme.desc: Martha shares tasty breakfast favorites made with yeast: hazelnut hot-cross buns, honey whole-wheat bread, and pull-apart whole-wheat monkey bread

programme.title: Martha Bakes
programme.desc: Martha makes better-for-you bake sale classics: lemon-yogurt cupcakes with raspberry frosting, whole-wheat sticky buns, orange-barley pound cake, and fluffy whey biscuits

programme.title: Martha Bakes
programme.desc: Martha shows how to make bakery-style cookies using better-for-you ingredients: farro chocolate-chunk, spelt-nut crescents, whole-wheat almond-butter sandwich, and granola

programme.title: Martha Bakes
programme.desc: Martha creates naturally gluten-free desserts: lemon-cornmeal cake, spiced pumpkin pie with crisp rice crust, and decadent flourless chocolate-walnut torte

programme.title: Martha Bakes
programme.desc: Martha transforms bread recipes using alternative flours: honey-wheat Parker House rolls, whole-wheat pita, and tasty molasses-oat bread. Plus, tips for making honey butter

programme.title: Martha Bakes
programme.desc: Martha updates vintage cake recipes with healthful ingredients: oat roulade with berry cream, chocolate buckwheat torte, and zucchini-almond cake with cream cheese frosting

programme.title: Martha Bakes
programme.desc: Martha shows how to transform one basic recipe into three stunning celebration cakes: naked berry chiffon cake, caramel chiffon cake, and woodland stump cake
